title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer has repeatedly tried to log in but the system keeps rejecting the credentials. Password reset attempts have also failed, leaving the account inaccessible.

title: Payment Failed - Card Declined
description: Payment using Visa ending 1234 fails every time despite having sufficient balance. The customer is unable to complete checkout due to repeated decline errors.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: When the user clicks on the 'Download Invoice' button nothing happens on the billing page. This is preventing them from saving official copies for their records.

title: Incorrect Billing Address
description: Even after updating the billing address in the profile, invoices are still being generated with the old address. This mismatch is creating confusion during audits.

title: App Crash on Launch
description: The mobile app crashes immediately upon opening on Android 13 devices. Users are unable to access any features or submit feedback through the app.

title: Refund Not Processed
description: Customer requested a refund two weeks ago but has not received the amount yet. Multiple follow-ups through email have also gone unanswered.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Issue
description: User is not receiving 2FA codes on their registered phone number which is blocking account access. Attempts to resend codes have also failed.

title: Unable to Update Profile Picture
description: Uploading a new profile picture returns a 'failed' error for both small and large files. The current image remains unchanged despite multiple attempts.

title: Subscription Auto-Renewal
description: Customer wants to enable auto-renewal for their subscription but the toggle in settings is disabled. They are worried about missing their next billing cycle.

title: Missing Order Confirmation Email
description: After successfully placing an order the customer has not received any confirmation email. This is causing uncertainty about the order status.

title: Coupon Not Applying at Checkout
description: A valid coupon code shows 'expired' error at checkout for multiple users. They are unable to apply the discount even after clearing cache.

title: Slow Dashboard Loading
description: Dashboard takes over 15 seconds to load during peak hours. Performance issue affects reporting modules and prevents timely analysis.

title: Shipping Address Not Saved
description: Address form resets after clicking 'Save & Continue' resulting in lost data. Customer cannot proceed with checkout until address persists.

title: Export to CSV Produces Empty File
description: Report export returns an empty CSV file even though the UI shows data. This prevents customers from analyzing or sharing reports offline.
